devdoc.details: The contract has both addresses of spouse1 and spouse2. It is capable of handling assets, funds and divorce. A multisig variant is used to consider the decision of both parties.

approveAsset(uint256).details: Approve the addition of a prior proposed asset. The other spouse needs to approve this action.

params._assetId: The id of the asset that should be approved.

assetIsApproved(uint256).details: Return whether asset has been approved by sender.

assetIsRemoved(uint256).details: Return whether asset has been removed by sender.

constructor.details: Constructor: Set the wallet addresses of both spouses.

divorce().details: Request to divorce. The other spouse needs to approve this action.

getAssetIds().details: Return a list of all asset ids.

pay(address,uint256).details: Send ETH to a target address.

proposeAsset(string,uint256,uint256).details: Propose an asset to add. The other spouse needs to approve this action.

params._data: The asset represented as a string.

params._writtenContractIpfsHash: IPFS hash of the written contract PDF.

removeAsset(uint256).details: Approve the removal of a prior proposed/already added asset. The other spouse needs to approve this action.

params._assetId: The id of the asset that should be removed.

senderDivorced().details: Return whether sending spouse has approved divorce.

senderSigned().details: Return whether sending spouse has signed.

devdoc.title: SmartWeddingContract
